sub-features.title: Smart Talent Discovery
sub-features.description: AI identifies and matches top candidates with roles, optimizing recruitment from the start.

sub-features.title: Diverse Talent Pool
sub-features.description: Source candidates from various backgrounds to ensure a diverse and well-rounded team.

sub-features.title: Automated Ranking
sub-features.description: AI ranks candidates by skills and potential, helping you focus on the best options.

sub-features.title: Resume Parsing
sub-features.description: Automatically extract key resume data, allowing faster, more accurate screening decisions.

sub-features.title: Bias-Free Screening
sub-features.description: AI ensures every candidate is screened fairly, reducing unconscious biases in evaluations.

sub-features.title: Customizable Criteria
sub-features.description: Tailor screening algorithms to match your specific hiring needs, ensuring best-fit candidates.

sub-features.title: Automated Scheduling
sub-features.description: Schedule interviews without manual effort, ensuring candidates and interviewers find convenient times.

sub-features.title: Video Analytics
sub-features.description: AI analyzes body language and communication during interviews to provide deeper performance insights.

sub-features.title: Comprehensive Reports
sub-features.description: Receive clear interview feedback and performance reports to support objective decision-making.

sub-features.title: Real-Time Feedback
sub-features.description: Instantly provide clear, actionable feedback to candidates and employees after every interview.

sub-features.title: Data-Driven Insights
sub-features.description: Use AI-generated feedback to improve both hiring decisions and employee development outcomes.

sub-features.title: Transparent Communication
sub-features.description: Foster trust and clarity by delivering transparent, detailed feedback throughout the recruitment process.
